description.sub: We've sent an email with a link to active your account to {email}

completed.title: Didn't get an email?
completed.sub: If you don't see an email from uus within an few minutes, a few things could have happened:

items.spam_folder: The email is on your spam folder.
items.mistake_email: The email address you entered had a mistake or typo.
items.another_email: You accidentally gave us another email address.
items.cant_deliver: We can't deliver the email on this address.

completed.reenter_email: Re-enter your email and try again
